title: Was This Dead Mom Haunting This House | Horror Podcast
description:
Today on another chilling episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

An adult recalls a childhood friend, memories of playing games, running around the house, and exploring the outdoors. 

The only catch, the childhood friend, had black eyes. And ultimately, was seen by only one person.

Who was this child? And what did it want with the living? 

We ask that question and more, today, on Real Ghost Stories Online. 

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!
If you like the show, please help keep us on the air and support the show by becoming an EPP (Extra Podcast Person). We'll give you a BONUS episode every week as a "Thank You" for your support.
